title: Democracy theory and practice
body_lines: People's action for Free and Fair Elections (PAFFREL) together with March 13 group launched a book "Democracy Theory and Practice, Sri Lanka Experience to mark the 90 years of universal Franchise in Sri Lanka. A discussion titled ' Do we want an administrator or an elected leader" was also held to mark the event. Here are some scenes of the event. Pix by Pradeep Dilrukshana
